cause.description:
We love sheep. They are nice but sometimes you just have to throw one at someone like Andy Savage. He is a student who attends Hilliard Davidson and sometimes (a lot) you just feel like you need to throw a sheep at him. We believe in doing that and to continue doing that to help the lives of others.
1. To throw sheep at Andy
2. To throw sheep at Andy
3. To throw more sheep at Andy
cause.mission: continue throwing sheep at Andy Savage
cause.name: Throwing Sheep At Andy
